```{r}
for (axe in c("econ", "govt", "scty")){
  young<-data[data$age =="Less than 18", axe]
  general<-data[axe]
  print(axe)
  print("**************************")
  alter<-"l"
  if (axe=="scty"){
    alter<-"g"
  }
  print(t.test(general, young, alternative = alter))
}
```
